snippet.title: Radiant Silvergun - Official Launch Trailer | Nintendo Direct September 2022
snippet.description:
Radiant Silvergun is available now on Nintendo Switch. Watch the launch trailer to learn more about this arcade shoot 'em up game.

2520 AD. Mankind has disappeared due to the light emitted by "stone-like objects" found in ancient strata. A year later, several survivors and a robot who evacuated to satellite orbit and escaped disappearing make a descent to Earth.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
